description: Adam May's stunning strike earns Forest Green a win over Solihull Moors in the National League.
title: Forest Green Rovers 1-0 Solihull Moors
title_page: Forest Green Rovers 1-0 Solihull Moors - BBC Sport
maintext:
Adam May's stunning strike earned Forest Green a win over Solihull Moors in the National League.
The midfielder found the top corner from 30 yards after half an hour to settle a tight contest at the New Lawn.
Solihull came close to an equaliser before the break when Manny Duku hit a post after a lightning counter attack.
It was Forest Green who looked more likely to add to their lead after half-time as Christian Doidge was denied on two occasions, but the hosts did enough to earn a victory that solidifies their position in the play-off places.
Solihull boss Matt Taylor is coming under pressure as his side have won just one of 15 games in all competitions in 2025.
